resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/2522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/2522</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">L'impératif</string>
            <string language="en">The imperative</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Befehl</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'impératif</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O imperativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Imperativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η προστακτική</string>
          </title>
          <language>fr</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) sobre l'imperatiu. Conté escenes de presentació, exercicis pràctics i d'avaluació, i un enllaç a l'edu365, reservat als usuaris, per fer preguntes, si és necessari, sobre el contingut de la MUD.</string>
            <string language="en">Mini teaching unit (MUD) on the imperative. It includes presentation scenes, practice and self-assessment exercises, and a user-only link to edu365 for answers to any queries on the unit.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">gramàtica</string>
            <string language="en">grammar</string>
            <string language="es">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">expressió oral</string>
            <string language="en">oral expression</string>
            <string language="es">expresión oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">segona llengua estrangera</string>
            <string language="en">second foreign language</string>
            <string language="es">segunda lengua extranjera</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit (SCHLAMM) auf dem 
Befehl. Er schließt Darstellung Szenen, Praxis- und 
Selbstbewertungsübungen und ein Benutzer-nur Link zu edu365 für 
Antworten zu allen möglichen Abfragen auf der Maßeinheit ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement (BOUE) sur 
l'impératif. Il inclut des scènes de présentation, pratique 
et des exercices de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment, et un lien 
d'utilisateur-seulement à edu365 pour des réponses à toutes les 
requêtes sur l'unité.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini (LAMA) no imperativo. 
Inclui cenas da apresentação, exercícios da prática e do 
self-assessment, e uma ligação do usuário-somente a edu365 para 
respostas a todas as perguntas na unidade.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione (FANGO) sull'imperativo.
Include le scene di presentazione, esercitazioni di valutazione 
di se stesso e di pratica e un collegamento dell'utente-soltanto a 
edu365 per le risposte a tutte le domande sull'unità.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) στην προστακτική. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις σκηνές παρουσίασης, τις ασκήσεις πρακτικής
και αυτοαξιολόγησης, και μια χρήστης-μόνη σύνδεση με edu365 για
τις απαντήσεις σε οποιεσδήποτε ερωτήσεις στη μονάδα.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grammatik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Mundausdruck</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">an zweiter Stelle Fremdsprache</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">grammaire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">expression orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">langue en second lieu étrangère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">gramática</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">expressão oral</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">língua em segundo extrangeira</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">grammatica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">espressione orale</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lingua in secondo luogo straniera</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γραμματική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">προφορική έκφραση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">δεύτερη ξένη γλώσσα</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
